website_summaries.verdict: Edit, cut, and paste entries with this four-line scientific calculator. Suitable for intermediate users.
pros: This well-made calculator is lightweight and simple to use
View previous entries with ease, so there's no need to keep writing out equations
Similar features to a graphing calculator without being overly advanced
cons: The screen can easily break if dropped

customer_reviews.title: What is Wrong with the US Department of Education?!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This technology is slightly newer than the wheel and flush-able toilet, yet our schools are still requiring the kids have one. There is a freaking free app on my 6th grader's smart phone that emulates this thing, but he's not allowed to use his phone in class. Maybe the US department of education should limit the length of contracts they make with industry partners to less than a generation!!
customer_reviews.author: Suborbital

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: As a 7th grade student, I have to do a lot of math that requires a lot of calculation. This calculator handles it really well, it is easy to use with multiple modes (i.e Classic,Math Print) and the keys don't get jammed. It has a large enough display to hold multiple calculations and overall can handle a beating. (If you consider a TI-34 calculator falling down a 1-story flight of stairs in a middle school as a beating.) Overall would recommend this for Middle School students!
customer_reviews.author: Itz_Wahee

customer_reviews.title: This is a good calculator for high school
customer_reviews.text: This is a good calculator for high school. It can handle fractions without converting them to decimals. However, I highly recommend you still learn how to handle fractions because I have news for you, "Everything is a fraction!" Seriously, percentages are fractions, ratios are fractions, money transactions involve fractions (interest rates, bond yields, late penalties), economics and accounting have indexes (which turn out to be fractions), and the list goes on. I hope I didn't spoil math for you.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong fan of TI-34
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the best calculator that I've ever owned. I got my first one in 3rd grade and have used it consistently since. I'm now a junior in college and it finally gave up on me after all these years. I love it so much that I've ordered another one. It's great because you can enter lists of numbers and do simple statistical functions (standard deviation, mean, etc.) and will work in nearly any class that a graphing calculator is not allowed. Much easier display and use than other models such as the TI-30.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Calculator
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is required for a middle school honors math class. We were able to get it on Amazon at a good price and have it delivered in a timely manner. It functioned well and we expected to have it for years like other TI products. Unfortunately, it fell out of our daughters accordion file onto the classroom floor and another student walked by before she could retrieve it. She thinks the other student must have stepped on it because the display broke in the center. So it is no longer usable and had to be replaced. Fortunately, this was not an expensive graphing calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd William Shell

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: The calculator is pretty OK, but it could’ve been a bit cheaper. I have to say the calculator works great and is awesome for kids in middle school. The instructions are sometimes confusing, but the calculator itself is fine. It didn’t have any scratches when it came, everything functioned properly, and the slide on slide off case that comes with it is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!! :D
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has already used this calculator at school, she needed a personal one especially since we are learning at home now. This calculator is a few dollars cheaper than when I bought it elsewhere years back, that’s a plus. I do wish that this calculator model comes in more colors to choose from. Overall, ti-34 is a simple straightforward calculator that is a must-have for middle school math!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed a new calculator with multiple lines. Teacher suggested this one and found it cheaper here than anywhere else locally. Received in 2 days (Prime) and we are very pleased with the purchase. Daughter should be able to use for a couple of years before having to upgrade to a higher function calculator. We will pass this down to others when she is done.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 different kinds of scientific calculators for my classroom. This was one of them and has become the favorite for our students. We even purchased one for each of our graduating seniors to take on to college. Classroom tested... does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVEEE THIS CALCULATOR, firstly, I love it because it’s so easy to use! It’s definitely perfect for math college classes forget the $100 one tbh, I was able to do more with my calculator than my colleagues $100 one. The simplification of an answer is what I love as a feature on this. It literally goes step by step. I’ve used this calculator as a student in high school and college. Hands down best calculator, along with its affordability. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Cindee

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator after not being able to readily find it in stores as the school year approached. The calculator is slim and sleek and works well. My son uses it for his math classes every day. It's small enough to fit in a separate side pocket on his backpack and very lightweight so that it doesn't add extra pounds. I am very pleased with this purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Newer Model, Same Great Features
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my daughter who used this particular model in school last year but unfortunately, she had to return the calculator when she progressed to the next grade. She was very excited to receive this item and was happy with the newer model as she stated that all of the keys and features that she is familiar with, were still present. Since she is happy with this item I will give this item a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Yorima

customer_reviews.title: Why does the display have 2 little white spots?
customer_reviews.text: A little unsatisfied with this product, only because there is a minor defect on the screen (see photo) there are 2 little white spots on the inside of the display screen. Other than that, it works great and nothing else is wrong. If I had purchased this item from the store, I'd go back and exchange for another. However, my kid needed this calculator and it's just too much trouble to ship it back and exchange. This is a small superficial defect and it does not affect the performance of the item, but it is just annoying to see.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator for 6-7 grader with elegant design and color
customer_reviews.text: Bought it from my 6th grader and she loves it. The calculator is easy to use with tons of functionality for 6-7 grader. Apart from the functions she loves the color combination very much. Its dual lines and check previous calculations helps her alot.
customer_reviews.author: KKL

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scientific calculator.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great calculator. If you need a scientific calculator, this is one of my favorites. I use it at work where I tutor math. This calculator has several features that can help a struggling math student.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth

customer_reviews.title: Worst cellphone ever, only calculator works
customer_reviews.text: Good at making calculations of all kinds. Best calculator ever! But no App Store, can’t make calls or send texts, no games or anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: calculator works great as expected
customer_reviews.text: i use this calculator every day for school and it works very well! its easy to use, has both simple and more complex functions, and is perfect for many exams.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn k

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the more expensive calculators if you're not getting too crazy. In my course, we're mainly focusing on probability and stats. It's nice that it's solar and I don't have to worry about dying batteries like my professor always warns everyone else. The input is a little different than the standard ti84 for a few things but if you just google the operation you're trying to do and ti34 you can figure out how to do what you need to do... for example "factorial ti34" will bring you to a page that easily explains how to calculate a factorial on this device. Easy and cheap, and this was way less expensive than in the bookstore!
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator, great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent calculator, great price. This calculator is easy to use and is a pretty color. My 13 year old had to have it for school, and is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: craftygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful learning tool!
customer_reviews.text: All three of my daughters use this product for school and say that it is easy to use and that it has a lot of features. Definitely a good investment as they would use this for middle school and all four years for high school.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Required for a
customer_reviews.text: This calculator was required for a college course my daughter was taking. It seemed really expensive everywhere we looked, but Amazon did have the best price
customer_reviews.author: Mb3

customer_reviews.title: The graphics are also nice. It puts lines in your fractions and shrinks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is as user-friendly as my old graphing calculator. Only, much cheaper. The graphics are also nice. It puts lines in your fractions and shrinks the numbers for exponents. It makes it easy to keep track when you are putting in bigger equations.
customer_reviews.author: Will Corley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect calculator for my 7th grader she uses it daily!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and read. My daughter uses this calculator daily in 7th grade. Great value and super inexpensive for the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: TI quality as always
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in 7th grade. She is using it regularly and we have no issues. TI has been NY go to calculator since I was in high school.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Works great not complicated and gets the math done!
customer_reviews.author: L.AnneP.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this calculator and even my older one who is in calculus has gone back to it for the math classes that don't require graphing. His has been in use for 6 years and is oing strong despite teen backpack wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrews

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator for the price and the functions that I need. I am a professional and not a student. Nowadays a computer can do many complex calculations fast. however, this is convenient when you are in the middle of something and do not want to start a new calculator or some other mathematical application and run some number checks...Biggest advantage is that one can see the flow of calculations and fractions more easily...
customer_reviews.author: Kali raina

customer_reviews.title: My high schooler and middle schooler love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my 14 yo and 12 yo. They both are very good at math and they love this calculator. It is a classic.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to help your student (and yourself)
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 7th grader in advanced math. All the things she world on in class with provided calculators are on this calculator. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Frumpy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Calculator
customer_reviews.text: I use this calculator for Statistics class. It has parenthesis which helps to reduce the iteration of calculations. It has store function with multiple variables to store the answer from previous calculation and easily scrolls up and down to previous calculations even after screen had been cleared. It has solar charge panel. It works under the minimum light conditions. I recommend this calculator for non-graphing calculations and everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Knight

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful experience, may cause somnambulism
customer_reviews.text: Using this calculator is truly a euphoric experience. One evening last year I was playing with it, going through the prime numbers (a classic pastime, I know) and then suddenly a magical feeling swept over me, like a wave. My body tingled, my senses grew fuzzy. Then nothingness. The next thing I know, I'm outside Geneva trying to break into the Large Hadron Collider. Basically, using this calculator is an incredible experience, but you may need a friend or loved one to babysit you and restrain you if necessary. Heed my warning.
customer_reviews.author: A Schim

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my needs.
customer_reviews.text: II bought this instrument for my 7th grade son to use in his math class, per teacher's requirements. I stay away from math.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator
customer_reviews.text: I needed a calculator to help me in Intermediate Algebra in college and also Statistics. Although the calculator has a flaw with statistics, SLIGHTLY. The only issue is that it would give you the error code. Long story short for statistics, it will only work for like the first five chapters, afterwards it will be an issue. So if you're planning to use this for Statistics, just know like I said, first five chapters or otherwise get a Ti-83 (Highly recommend)
customer_reviews.author: IamSirrius

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice calculator. I bought it for my daughter in 5th grade. She likes that it has a multi-line view, something that other fellow students complain about not having on their calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Hesh

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3erd TI-34
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these calculators for my children as was required from their school. No complaints about them. All of them arrived in optimum conditions and time and, of course, works perfectly good.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping! Lowest price I could find!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son’s middle school math class. Works as it should. This was the lowest price I could find it.
customer_reviews.author: ThreeTboys

customer_reviews.title: calculations. As calculator works well
customer_reviews.text: The calculator works well. The instructions are good and tell you how to make the calcultions.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Ed

customer_reviews.title: Back to school score
customer_reviews.text: Kids needed for school. Of course I wait until last minute to find them. Price comparable to walmart.
customer_reviews.author: becky penz

customer_reviews.title: sexy calculator
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and manages to do so much, but access to the sin, cos, and tan buttons are within trig (shift, pi). So that can be a little annoying to do if you have to use that a lot, but I still love this calculator and it motivates me to do more math just so I can use it more because it's so darn good looking. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such a low price scientific calculator.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this TI-34 calculator for my daughter at 1st year college statistic class. The professor does not allow graphic calculator. It fits her need for the class well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good for middle schoolers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who started middle school this year. She liked it so far
customer_reviews.author: Nk

customer_reviews.title: Numbers 0,1,4 & 7 do not work...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter as a required school supply for her 7th grade math class... When she finally started using the calculator (after 7 days out of school for Hurricane Irma) our return window (September 14) closed.... The numbers 0, 1, 4 & 7 on the unit do not work. Had to go buy another one at Office Depot...needless to say, I am disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: krissy brady

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Calculator. Same as my son's school had so it was easy for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: broj

customer_reviews.title: Just the calculator we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were told to get for our son for the 2018-2019 school year. The price was great and it's one more thing we can cross off the "Back-To-School list. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Ezrway

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator
customer_reviews.text: This is the one my daughter's school recommends. It is easy to use, and has an instruction "cheat sheet" in the back. Comes in a sturdy case to keep out backpack debris too.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Spang

customer_reviews.title: Does what the manufacturer says
customer_reviews.text: According to my son he says this calculator is “lit” being it’s a good calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dreamhouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NYS tests
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son to complete NYS testing. Consists of all needed functions for middle school math. Cover protects against scratches and accidental falls.
customer_reviews.author: Kbrown0918

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for middle school
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to really dislike it’s a great calculator with the case so it doesn’t get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Kamper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I find this calculator to be perfect for the needs of my kids
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good prodict
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Good product. Needed this specific one- not in our area stores. Had to buy twice as first one broke via teenager 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: FireMama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for middle schoolers!!
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator for kids in middle school. My daughter is in 6th grade and in pre-algebra. This calculator enables her to not just check her answers but also the steps that she got the answer from. It has the ability to simplify fractions as well. Great buy and it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dlegister

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a couple years in college and now I use it every once in a while. It’s been my favorite calculator. It’s easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mae

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is the one using this and she said it is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what Middle Schooler wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed for Middle school and was the exact one her teacher uses, except it is the newer model. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for a starting off scientific calculator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother, will help him in school till he gets a higher end model.
customer_reviews.author: Syeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Required for school. I like that it is solar powered, no batteries required.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Good Calculator
customer_reviews.text: It's a great calculator. Still not as good as my 1980 Sharp EL-5103. That was the best calculator ever made and I've not seen anything come close. This TI does get me closer to the Sharp's features. It's a bit clumsy to navigate back for editing, but it does do it.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Jingle

customer_reviews.title: Great vaule
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Bought it for my 6th grader he doesnt ever leave it because it makes his math classes easier.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Great for junior high school math
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator for my kid that was going into the 7th grade. It is perfect for her advanced math class. Also a plus is that the slide cover protects the face and keys from being damaged in her backpack.
customer_reviews.author: BD One

customer_reviews.title: Most useful
customer_reviews.text: Grandson using at school in math and science courses. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: sherrye nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6th Grade
customer_reviews.text: This was on my daughters school supply list and no one in the area had it. So Glad it was on Amazon and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Brawl Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to use going back to college. She likes it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander d henry

customer_reviews.title: TI Quality, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son for a college math course. Texas Instruments makes dependable calculators, and, if you can use it, this one contains plenty of scientific calculation keys without the complexity of the TI-84 or TI-89 graphing calculators. A good value, as well, especially considering that Amazon drop-shipped it to my son's dorm and it arrived in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie, Mother of 9Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Math Class
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter at the beginning of last school year and it held up and served her well.

customer_reviews.title: Third purchase, it's that useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a back-up for husband who loves this. Third purchase. Lost first, bought second which husband uses all the time. So I got him this third one to keep in a drawer, ready to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Troy

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunally they go well with the lousy common core mathematics.
customer_reviews.text: My child wont use any other. Even after i tried to say they are all basically the same. Now we have two. One at school and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: 8th grader loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it a lot and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: stacey mangiaracina

customer_reviews.title: College Student Approved
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and inexpensive too. Unless you need a graphing calculator, this is your best bet!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Link

customer_reviews.title: 🧮
customer_reviews.text: We paid a cheaper price, but it was still in its original packaging. So it was a good deal to me! Works perfectly and my daughter will be using it for school....fingers crossed the Corona doesn't mess with back to school.
customer_reviews.author: Your Momma

customer_reviews.title: Bought for kid for school
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find for this was on amazon. Works well and great prime delivery as always. Works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: The one we received seemed a bit cold. There was quite a bit of discoloration on the cardboard. However, it seems to work so far
customer_reviews.text: The one we received seemed a bit old. There was quite a bit of discoloration on the cardboard. However, it seems to work so far. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bought for high school and middle school use
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what a highschooler and a middle schooler needs. Both of them are using this and I’m having no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Eye

customer_reviews.title: Calculator
customer_reviews.text: My student live this item for me just need to understand it uses. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son’s math class
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. He said it saved him in math class and his teacher was impressed with the model he was able to get. The case we got to go with it is a huge protection item and saves the calculator from accidental drops.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Bear Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Many functions are missing
customer_reviews.text: Not a real scientific calculator, many important functions are missing, disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Everything A Middle-Schooler Needs...Period!
customer_reviews.text: My son is in 6th grade. This calculator has all the functionality he needs and enough to get him through most, if not all, of H.S. The keys are nice and solid feeling. The display is crisp and fast. It's a very intuitive machine. Being able to scroll backwards to track previous steps is worth it's weight in gold when he makes a mistake. In short, you will not go wrong buying this calculator.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiGuy

customer_reviews.title: This is going to save me from going over a waterfall in my healthcare statistics class!!!
customer_reviews.text: I began using this within minutes after the truck drove away. The screen absolutely holds so much-- and the ability to use parenthesis in the numerator and the denominator saves so much time when figure out death rates and autopsy rates etc. The screen is easy for me to read, and I appreciate the ability to adjust the brightness. I think this is going to work for me--as I try to get through this class.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 6th grade daughter.I looks kind of same the one I've been using for 15 years (so durable !).User friendly , easy to use without reading manual like other brands,and this one has fraction function which my daughter really liked it.I guess it can last until she finishes high school
customer_reviews.author: VP2010

customer_reviews.title: Broken in  1 year and 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Sep 2017 and now is May 2019, so it broken in 1 year and 8 months, dont think the quality of this kind of product only last such short period of time with so light usage.. My old calculator last 10-15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: it does what's expected and the display is very easy to read
customer_reviews.text: OK, I've had this calculator for almost two months. The layout takes a bit of getting used to. I had to explore it a bit to find some of the things I needed it for. Still, it does what's expected and the display is very easy to read. Good for college level math when the graphing calculator is restricted.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've used this model for years and love it. Ordered more for coworkers. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a college math class and love it. Much better than a regular calculator yet not as bulky as a graphing calculator. So if you don't need the graphing but do need to do fractions, exponents, algebra, etc..... this one's for you.
customer_reviews.author: TA Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Middle school calculator for my son that was on his list
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Best calculator
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the calculators I am able to use at my school and I really do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Case was all scratched
customer_reviews.text: Waited 2 weeks for this to be delivered. When I did get it, the case was all scratched. My daughter needed it for her 8th grade class asap, so I had no time to complain and get a new one. Was afraid I was going to wait another 2wks.
customer_reviews.author: k.t.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and reliable
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using it for several years, now I am getting a second one. Lightweight and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: zs

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent functionality. My daughter has been learning its functions and becomes easier with every use
customer_reviews.author: connor53

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for scientific notation and working with fractions. Other calculators usually mess up calculating with those two factors.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and in a timely manner. Perfect! I paid for two day shipping and it came on the specified date. Just what I paid for. The calculator works very well. It's one of my favorites. I gave my sister my old one which is why I had to buy this one. She loves her calculator too. It's the same model.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pittman

customer_reviews.title: It's great to see that Texas Instruments has kept up with ...
customer_reviews.text: This calculator has been around for years and is a classic. It's great to see that Texas Instruments has kept up with the times by adding expanded features that are relevant and helpful for students. My child is really pleased with this calculator as well! I paid a great price for this on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Gemini Sun

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find in a local store because they were in demand in my grandson’s school district.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 11 year old grandson needed for Math class. I really have know idea how to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Slacker

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator!
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is adding up or maybe it's percentage is going up! LOL! My daughter needed this calculator for her class. It is a very nice calculator. While it's not a graphing calculator, it has plenty of functions for both everyday use and for her class. It's easy to use and easy to read. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my neice to use at school. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jennylyn Ork

customer_reviews.title: Nice calculator
customer_reviews.text: I bought a TI-33 and a TI-34 for my two high school boys. Both calculators are good but I felt the TI-33 was better for what they were doing in high school and for use on the SATs. I only gave it 4 stars because I was a little disappointed that the TI -33 seemed to do more than the TI-34 and logic usually dictates that the higher numbered version usually is an improved, built upon version of the previous model.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator, smaller than most scientific calculators I've used, lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ross

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I helps me with my healthcare statistics class. It is a good calculator for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ncauntie230

customer_reviews.title: We would’ve locked the Calculator had it not been so damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item came to us almost completely damaged it was very scuffed up with her like somebody had dropped it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jaynes Dixon

customer_reviews.title: High quality and cute color
customer_reviews.text: High quality as with all TI calculators. Cute color for my middle schooler.
customer_reviews.author: Sunpenny

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I received this with a broken screen. I just threw it in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Tesha

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and well built, has all the functions you'll need.
customer_reviews.text: This is going into middle school everyday, getting dropped, sat on, and stuffed into the bottom of a rolling backpack, and it's still going. It has all the functions you'd ever need, and the best thing is that it's totally solar, so you don't have to worry about changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: AdriannicusTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

product_meta.title: Texas Instruments TI-34 MultiView Scientific Calculator
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue, White| Style:Single PackIntermediate, four-line scientific calculator with advanced fraction capabilities for middle school math and science. 

Key Features: 

Four-line display One- and two-variable statistics MathPrint™ feature Advanced fraction capabilities Step-by-step fraction simplification Edit, cut, and paste entries Solar and battery powered 
Ideal For: Middle School math Pre-Algebra Algebra 1 and 2 General science Geometry
feature_bullets: 4-line display enables scrolling and editing of inputs
Same functionality as the TI-34II Explorer plus display and feature enhancements
MATHPRINT mode for input in math notation, including pi, square roots, fractions, percent's and exponents plus math notation output for fractions
Previous Entry - Lets you review previous entries and look for patterns.
Menus - Easy to read and navigate pull-down menus similar to those on a graphing calculator.
All mode settings are located in one central place, the mode screen.
Scientific Notation Output - View scientific notation with the proper superscripted exponents and see the output in scientific notation.
Table feature - Easily explore an (x, y) table of values for a given function, automatically or by entering specific x values
Fraction features - View and perform fraction computations and explorations in familiar textbook format.
